title: Bug 101187: Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description: Bug 101187: Localization key cannot be blank when adding. Description: When the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: Currently, if the key is blank, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: In the properties file, the key can be left blank but it should still have a valid value. The expected result is that the text should be externalized and displayed in the chart title.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Add a localization key but leave it blank. 2. Check if the externalized text is displayed in the chart title.
